verses.verse: When the <S%H5029>prophets,<s%> <S%H9119>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet<s%> and <S%H9104>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> <S%H5029>prophesied<s%> to the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> were in <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> in the <S%H8036>name<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel,<s%> who was <S%H5922>over<s%> them,

<S%H116>then<s%> <S%H2217>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H7598>Shealtiel<s%> and <S%H3443>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H9189>Jozadak<s%> <S%H6966>arose<s%> and <S%H8271>began<s%> to <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H5029>prophets<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> were with them <S%H5583>supporting<s%> them.

At that <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H8674>Tattenai,<s%> the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of [the province] <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> and Shethar-bozenai and their <S%H3675>colleagues<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> to them and <S%H560>spoke<s%> to them <S%H3652>thus,<s%> <S%H4479>"Who<s%> <S%H7761>issued<s%> you a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>temple<s%> and to <S%H3635>finish<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>structure<s%>?"

<S%H116>Then<s%> we <S%H560>told<s%> them <S%H3660>accordingly<s%> <S%H4479>what<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> were <S%H1768>who<s%> were <S%H1124>reconstructing<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1147>building.<s%>

But the <S%H5870>eye<s%> of their <S%H426>God<s%> was on the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews,<s%> and they did not <S%H989>stop<s%> them <S%H5705>until<s%> a <S%H2942>report<s%> should <S%H1981>come<s%> to <S%H1868>Darius,<s%> and <S%H116>then<s%> a <S%H5407>written<s%> <S%H5407>reply<s%> be <S%H8421>returned<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> it.

[This is] the <S%H6573>copy<s%> of the <S%H104>letter<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H8674>Tattenai,<s%> the <S%H6347>governor<s%> of [the province] <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> and Shethar-bozenai and his <S%H3675>colleagues<s%> the <S%H671>officials,<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> were <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> to <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%>
They <S%H7972>sent<s%> a <S%H6600>report<s%> to him in which it was <S%H3790>written<s%> <S%H1836>thus:<s%> "To <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H8001>peace.<s%>

"Let it be <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king,<s%> that we have <S%H236>gone<s%> to the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H3061>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H426>God,<s%> <S%H1932>which<s%> is being <S%H1124>built<s%> with <S%H1560>huge<s%> <S%H69>stones,<s%> and <S%H636>beams<s%> are being <S%H7761>laid<s%> in the <S%H3797>walls;<s%> and <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H5673>work<s%> is <S%H5648>going<s%> on with <S%H629>great<s%> <S%H629>care<s%> and is <S%H6744>succeeding<s%> in their <S%H3028>hands.<s%>

<S%H116>"Then<s%> we <S%H7593>asked<s%> <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H7868>elders<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to them <S%H3660>thus,<s%> <S%H4479>'Who<s%> <S%H7761>issued<s%> you a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>temple<s%> and to <S%H3635>finish<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>structure<s%>?'

"We <S%H638>also<s%> <S%H7593>asked<s%> them their <S%H8036>names<s%> so as to <S%H3046>inform<s%> you, and that we might <S%H3790>write<s%> <S%H3790>down<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> were at their <S%H7217>head.<s%>

"And <S%H3660>thus<s%> they <S%H8421>answered<s%> <S%H6600><s%> us, <S%H560>saying,<s%> 'We are the <S%H5649>servants<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and <S%H772>earth<s%> and are <S%H1124>rebuilding<s%> the <S%H1005>temple<s%> that was <S%H1124>built<s%> <S%H7690>many<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H6928>ago,<s%> which a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> and <S%H3635>finished.<s%>

'But <S%H4481>because<s%> <S%H1768><s%> our fathers had <S%H2>provoked<s%> the <S%H7265>God<s%> of <S%H426>heaven<s%> to <S%H8065>wrath,<s%> He <S%H7265>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3052>hand<s%> of <S%H3028>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5020>king<s%> of <S%H4430>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H895>Chaldean,<s%> [who] <S%H3779>destroyed<s%> <S%H5642>this<s%> <S%H1836>temple<s%> and <S%H1005>deported<s%> the <S%H1541>people<s%> to <S%H5972>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H1297>'However,<s%> in the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H4430>King<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H7761>issued<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God.<s%>

'And <S%H638>also<s%> the <S%H1722>gold<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>utensils<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H5312>taken<s%> from the <S%H1965>temple<s%> in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2987>brought<s%> them to the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1994>these<s%> <S%H4430>King<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H5312>took<s%> from the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> and they were <S%H3052>given<s%> to one whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar,<s%> <S%H1768>whom<s%> he had <S%H7761>appointed<s%> <S%H6347>governor.<s%>

'And he <S%H560>said<s%> to him, <S%H5376>"Take<s%> <S%H429>these<s%> <S%H3984>utensils,<s%> <S%H236>go<s%> [and] <S%H5182>deposit<s%> them in the <S%H1965>temple<s%> in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and let the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> be <S%H1124>rebuilt<s%> in its <S%H870>place.<s%>"

<S%H116>'Then<s%> that <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> [and] <S%H3052>laid<s%> the <S%H787>foundations<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and from <S%H116>then<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> it has been <S%H1124>under<s%> <S%H1124>construction,<s%> and it is not [yet] <S%H8000>completed.<s%>'

"And <S%H3705>now,<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> it <S%H2869>pleases<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> let a <S%H1240>search<s%> be <S%H1240>conducted<s%> in the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H1596>treasure<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> is <S%H8536>there<s%> in <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> it be that a <S%H2942>decree<s%> was <S%H7761>issued<s%> by <S%H4430>King<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> to <S%H1124>rebuild<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and let the king <S%H7972>send<s%> to us his <S%H9568>decision<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> [matter]."
